subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Scott Wimmer passed his Richard Childress Racing teammate Clint Bowyer with 21 laps to go and held on to win the Nascar Nationwide Series Pepsi 300 at Nashville Superspeedway. Bowyer took the series points lead from Kevin Harvick, who skipped the race.
